alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:17AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Broome and southern Chenango Counties through 700 AM EDT... At 616 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chenango Forks to near Binghamton to Brackney. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Kirkwood, Conklin, Sanford, Coventry, Port Dickinson, Bainbridge, Windsor, Afton and Chenango Forks. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 6. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 75 and 83. Interstate 88 between 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
